title: Bug 4974: Setting classpath/output location should be one operation
description: When you press Ok, you get the error message: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The problem is that setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations. By setting the output location first, an illegal state is created.
OB: Pressing Ok results in the error message: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'.
EB: The error message should instead be: 'Setting the output location and classpath separately creates an illegal state.'
SR: Implement a single operation that sets both the classpath and output location simultaneously to avoid creating an illegal state.
